meanings.definition: A line of descent traced continuously from an ancestor.
meanings.sent1: My genealogy shows that my great-grandfather was a farmer.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys researching her family genealogy to learn about her roots.
meanings.sent3: The genealogy of our family tree is like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the genealogy of ideas can lead to surprising connections.
meanings.sent5: The intricate genealogy of the royal family is documented in history books.

meanings.definition: The study and tracing of lines of descent or development.
meanings.sent1: Learning about genealogy helps us understand our family history.
meanings.sent2: The genealogy of languages reveals fascinating connections between cultures.
meanings.sent3: The genealogy club at school is always busy uncovering new family stories.
meanings.sent4: In science fiction, the genealogy of alien species can be quite complex.
meanings.sent5: Studying the genealogy of art movements can provide insights into artistic evolution.
